"""This script is called on the Invoice after the delivery builder has created
 the new Invoice.
 """
 from Products.ERP5Type.Message import translateString
 try:
 from Products.CMFCore.WorkflowCore import WorkflowException
 except ImportError:
 # WorkflowException has not always been allowed in restricted
 # environment, in this case, make sure WorkflowException is 
 # defined 
 class WorkflowException(Exception):
 pass
 
 if related_simulation_movement_path_list is None:
 raise RuntimeError, 'related_simulation_movement_path_list is missing. Update ERP5 Product.'
 
 invoice = context
 
 # set resource from price currency
 #if not invoice.getResource():
 # invoice.setResource(invoice.getPriceCurrency())
 
 related_packing_list = invoice.getDefaultCausalityValue()
 
 # copy title, if not updating a new delivery
 if not invoice.hasTitle() and related_packing_list.hasTitle():
 invoice.setTitle(related_packing_list.getTitle())
 
 # initialize accounting_workflow to confirmed state
 if invoice.getSimulationState() == 'draft':
 try :
 context.getPortalObject().portal_workflow.doActionFor(
 invoice, 'confirm_action',
 comment=translateString('Initialised by Delivery Builder.'),
 skip_period_validation=1)
 except WorkflowException, e:
 # The user cannot pass the transition, it's OK
 pass
 
 if invoice.getSimulationState() == 'draft':
 # call the workflow method, if the user cannot perform this operation.
 invoice.confirm(comment=translateString('Initialised by Delivery Builder.'),)
 
 
 # First set the invoice in the building state on the causality workflow
 invoice.startBuilding()
 
 # Then an activity should put the causality state in diverged or solved
 invoice.activate(after_path_and_method_id=(related_simulation_movement_path_list,
 ('immediateReindexObject','recursiveImmediateReindexObject'))).updateCausalityState()
